sentence: She needs to brush ______ on her Spanish before the trip.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'brush up on' significa repasar o mejorar una habilidad que no has usado recientemente.

sentence: They decided to call ______ the wedding.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'call off' significa cancelar.

sentence: He came ______ with a great idea for the campaign.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'come up with' significa pensar en o sugerir una idea o plan.

sentence: I can't put ______ with his attitude anymore.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'put up with' significa tolerar a alguien o algo desagradable.

sentence: She takes ______ her mother; they are very similar.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'take after' significa parecerse a un familiar mayor.

sentence: The negotiations broke ______ without an agreement.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'break down' puede significar dejar de funcionar o fracasar.

sentence: I ran ______ an old friend at the supermarket.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'run into' significa encontrarse con alguien por casualidad.

sentence: He promised to look ______ my cat while I'm away.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'look after' significa cuidar de alguien o algo.

sentence: We need to get ______ to the real issue here.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'get down to' significa empezar a hacer o considerar algo seriamente.

sentence: She finally got ______ her fear of flying.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'get over' significa recuperarse de una enfermedad, sorpresa o miedo.

sentence: The company is looking ______ new employees.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'look for' significa buscar.

sentence: Don't give ______! You're almost there.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'give up' significa rendirse o dejar de intentar.

sentence: The plane will take ______ in ten minutes.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'take off' significa despegar (para aviones) o quitarse (ropa).

sentence: It's cold, you should put ______ a jacket.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'put on' significa ponerse ropa.

sentence: He turned ______ the job offer because it didn't pay enough.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'turn down' significa rechazar una oferta o bajar el volumen.

sentence: They decided to break ______ after a long relationship.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'break up' significa terminar una relación.

sentence: If you don't know the word, look it ______ in the dictionary.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'look up' significa buscar información en un diccionario o libro de referencia.

sentence: Don't bring ______ that topic again, it's too sensitive.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'bring up' significa mencionar un tema o criar a un niño.

sentence: Please go ______ with your story, I'm listening.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'go on' significa continuar o seguir.

sentence: We need to set ______ a meeting for next week.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'set up' significa organizar o establecer algo.

sentence: I hope everything works ______ for you.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'work out' significa resolver un problema o tener éxito.

sentence: I came ______ an old photo album while cleaning.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'come across' significa encontrar algo o a alguien por casualidad.

sentence: She needs to fill ______ this form before she leaves.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'fill in' o 'fill out' significa rellenar un formulario.

sentence: He needs to cut ______ on sugar if he wants to lose weight.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'cut down on' significa reducir el consumo de algo.

sentence: They decided to eat ______ tonight instead of cooking.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'eat out' significa comer fuera de casa.

sentence: I need to pick ______ my sister from the airport.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'pick up' significa recoger a alguien.

sentence: He needs to get ______ of bed, it's already noon.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'get up' significa levantarse.

sentence: She needs to put ______ her clothes after washing them.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'put away' significa guardar algo en su lugar.

sentence: He needs to throw ______ his old shoes.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'throw away' o 'throw out' significa desechar algo.

sentence: I need to tidy ______ my room before my parents arrive.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'tidy up' significa ordenar o arreglar.

sentence: She needs to switch ______ the lights when she leaves the room.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'switch off' significa apagar un aparato eléctrico.

sentence: I need to get ______ with my work.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'get on with' significa continuar o progresar con algo.

sentence: He needs to catch ______ on his studies.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'catch up on' significa ponerse al día con algo.

sentence: She needs to look ______ the new student.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'look after' significa cuidar de alguien.

sentence: They decided to give ______ smoking.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'give up' significa dejar un hábito.

sentence: He needs to put ______ with her bad temper.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'put up with' significa tolerar.

sentence: She needs to take ______ her shoes before entering the house.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'take off' significa quitarse la ropa o los zapatos.

sentence: I need to turn ______ the volume, it's too loud.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'turn down' significa bajar el volumen o rechazar una oferta.

sentence: He needs to call ______ his appointment.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'call off' significa cancelar.

sentence: I need to get ______ with my work.
explanation: El phrasal verb 'get on with' significa continuar o progresar con algo.
